summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，表示写入和读取用户批注的数据存储区。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, represents a data store for writing and reading user annotations.

summary.span: 将新 添加到存储区中。

span.span: Adds a new to the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新建添加到存储其全局唯一标识符 (GUID)属性设置为新值。When a new is added to the store its globally unique identifier (GUID) property is set to a new value. 当调用时，其属性检查以查看是否已被添加到应用商店。When is called, its property is checked to see if the already has been added to the store. 如果已添加了，并且存在于存储 (由其属性)引发错误。If the already has been added and exists in the store (as determined by its property) an error is thrown.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 存储区中已存在具有相同 属性值的 。

span.span: An with the same property value already exists in the store.
has been called on the store.

summary.span: 当存储区中任何 上的定位点更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an anchor on any in the store changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可用于监视更改的批注而无需在每个注册存储中包含单独。The event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation contained in the store without the need to register on each individually.

summary.span: 当存储区中任何 上的作者更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an author on any in the store changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可用于监视更改的批注而无需在每个注册存储中包含单独。The event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation contained in the store without the need to register on each individually.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否立即将批注缓冲区中的数据写入物理数据存储区。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store.

value.span: 如果对每次操作都要立即将批注缓冲区中的数据写入物理数据存储区，则为 ；如果要在应用程序显式调用 时写入批注缓冲区中的数据，则为 。

span.span: if data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store for each operation; otherwise, if data in the annotation buffers is to be written when the application explicitly calls .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用显式保存模型的应用程序可以设置到`false`，并调用直接在适当的时候。Applications that use an explicit-save model can set to `false` and call directly when appropriate. 使用隐式保存模型的应用程序可以设置到`true`导致自动调用后的每个存储操作 （添加、 删除或修改）。Applications that use an implicit-save model can set to `true` to cause to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).

summary.span: 当存储区中任何 上的 cargo 更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cargo on any in the store changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可用于监视更改的批注而无需在每个注册存储中包含单独。The event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation contained in the store without the need to register on each individually.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由存储区占用的所有托管和非托管资源。

span.span: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources used by the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序应调用时已完成，但。Applications should call when finished with the . 在调用应用程序可以释放对所有引用以允许垃圾回收器回收内存的占用。After calling the application can release all references to the to allow the garbage collector to reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). 公众方法调用受保护`(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数的`true`释放所有托管和非托管资源。The public method calls the protected `(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter of `true` to release all managed and unmanaged resources. > [!NOTE] > 调用之前的最后一个引用发布。Call before the last reference to the is released. 如果未调用垃圾回收器调用的存储之前，不会释放资源方法。If is not called, resources will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the store's method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由存储区占用的非托管资源，并有选择地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the store and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此受保护方法调用由公共和方法。This protected method is called by the public and methods. 公众调用受保护`(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。The public invokes the protected `(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数是`true`，版本的所有资源都持有的任何托管对象的的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, releases all resources held by any managed objects that the references. 此外调用`Dispose()`每个引用对象的方法。 also invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅 [实现 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息并，请参阅 [清理了非托管 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 保证最终为此存储区调用 。

span.span: Guarantees that will eventually be called for this store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重写基方法。This method overrides base method. 应用程序不应调用直接。The application program should not call directly. 除非通过调用已禁用自动调用垃圾回收期间方法。 is automatically invoked during garbage collection unless disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，并[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用显式保存模型的应用程序可以设置到`false`，并调用直接在适当的时候。Applications that use an explicit-save model can set to `false` and call directly when appropriate. 使用隐式保存模型的应用程序可以设置到`true`导致自动调用后的每个存储操作 （添加、 删除或修改）。Applications that use an implicit-save model can set the to `true` to cause to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法时在应用程序关闭。The following example shows how to use the method when the application closes the .
